name: Ordisoftware Core Library
short_description:
The Ordisoftware Core Library for .NET provides core classes that help developping and debugging programs:

* Application running and interactions are controlled by System and Display Manager.
* Exceptions are managed to provide flow control and advanced details of errors.
* Execution sequences are monitored by an almost automated way through an Enter/Leave system.
* The remoting is encapsulated to facilitate the development of client server.
* Generic persistent Singleton class.
* Threads manager.
* Unit Testing manager.
* Some utilities for strings, files, etc.
